name: Bead Art - Coloring Puzzle
description:
Place colorful beads, iron them on, and create lots of amazing bead art!

Sharpen your mind with a "Bead Art" brain training bead coloring puzzle game.
“Bead Art" is a simple but addictive bead and iron coloring puzzle game.
During your commute, before you sleep… enjoy downtime with brain training.

In this ultra fun and relaxing puzzle game, place colorful beads and iron them to melt the beads and complete a wonderful bead art.
Finish placing the beads, iron them, and your bead art is complete!
Feel the ASMR of beads and irons as you complete your bead art!

Take the challenge and train your brain NOW!

Rules:
* Place the beads correctly, melt the beads with an iron, and your bead art is complete
* The correct bead position is indicated by a blinking light
* Feel the ASMR of beads and irons

Challenge yourself and enjoy hours of fun with bead coloring puzzle!
You’re sure to get hooked on these puzzles!
How many bead art can you see?
